feedback: Provided at least 4 distinct testing phases.
Test schedule shows logical sequencing aligned with development schedule.
Appropriate resource allocation based on expertise.
Clear and relevant deliverables for each phase.
Selected 4 of the appropriate top risks.

Test coverage percentages sum to 100% as required.
Test coverage allocation does not reflect project priorities.
Resources appropriately assigned based on expertise.
Selected the most appropriate testing approach for the project context.
